accuracy.description: The correctness of the answers provided by the system.

reasoning_trace.description: The ability to follow the system's logical steps leading to the answer.

relevance.description: The relevance of the system's answer to the posed question.

response_time.description: The time taken by the system to generate an answer.

novelty.description: The uniqueness of the system's answer compared to information readily available on the internet.

explanation_clarity.description: The clarity of the explanation accompanying the system's answers.
